code: var addCommentReducer=function addCommentReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'ADDCOMMENT':state=action.up;state[action.indx].comments.push(action.newc);return state;default:return state;}};export default addCommentReducer;
